item.title: SpaceX 的小对手飙升 1300%。现在是卫星发射
item.description: AST SpaceMobile 公司是一家希望与太空探索技术公司（SpaceX）竞争的小型电信公司，在短短六个月内从 2 美元飙升至 28 美元，成为今年全球最热门的股票之一。【原文：AST SpaceMobile Inc., the tiny telecom company that wants to compete with SpaceX, has become one of the hottest stocks in the world this year after soaring from $2 to $28 in just six months.】

item.title: 经济学家称泰国新总理的改革蓝图缺乏具体内容
item.description: 泰国新任总理制定了一份路线图，以解决从接近历史最高水平的家庭债务到不温不火的经济增长和老龄化社会等最紧迫的问题。但据经济学家称，该计划缺乏能确保在规定时间内取得成果的细节。【原文：Thailand’s new prime minister has a roadmap to deal with the most pressing issues ranging from a near-record household debt to a tepid growth rate and an aging society. But the plan is short on details that would ensure time-bound outcomes, according to economists.】

item.title: 95 万亿美元 ETF 市场风险部分闪现看跌信号
item.description: 价值 9.5 万亿美元的 ETF 市场正出现越来越多的不景气迹象，有可能暴露出周三的股市下跌买盘只是交易员从投机交易工具中套现的假象。【原文：Signs of gloom are mounting in the $9.5 trillion ETF landscape, threatening to expose Wednesday’s dip buying in stocks as a head-fake with traders cashing out of speculative trading vehicles.】

item.title: 债券和股票暴跌，MultiPlan 与部分持有人进行债务谈判

item.description: 帕尔默广场资本管理公司（Palmer Square Capital Management）将推出一对交易所交易基金，用于购买抵押贷款债务和其他资产，随着投资者进入证券化信贷市场的渠道不断扩大，此类融资工具也在近期激增。【原文：Palmer Square Capital Management is launching a pair of exchange-traded funds that will buy collateralized loan obligations and other assets, adding to a recent proliferation of such financing vehicles as investor access to securitized credit markets expands.】

item.description: 墨西哥比索周三在主要货币中涨幅居首，这主要是受到全球因素的提振，以及交易员们对该国司法系统有争议的改革获得批准的看法，该改革对该国资产造成了压力。【原文：The Mexican peso led gains among major currencies Wednesday, boosted by global factors and as traders looked past the approval of a controversial overhaul of the nation’s judicial system that’s weighed on the nation’s assets.】
